name: I Am Not On Fire Yet
name_original: I Am Not On Fire Yet
description:
Your space ship is powered by a strange fire that must be kept going at all times. But if it grows out of hand, it can disable your ships' systems or even burn you alive! Use the ship's sprinkler systems to keep the fire under control, while also fighting off alien ships, getting pelted by asteroids, and struggling to repair your ship as it starts to break! Can you make it back to Earth alive?

Made for the GMTK 2020 Game Jam.
